content: working yarn leaving a tail of contrast yarn and start working with main approximately 38 cm 15 inches now you colour yarn here pick up 1 extra st in the can kitchener stitch your toe closed ladder from the row below and k tbl pm work row 8 of cable pattern pm pick up 1 extra st in the ladder from the row below and k tbl pick up and k 14 16 18 sts along your heel flap round 1 k to 2 sts before marker k2tog sm work next row in cable pattern across the front of sock sm ssk k to end of round round 2 k to m sm work next row in cable pattern across the front of sock sm k to end of round 3 wonderment socks by debbie ford abbreviations k2tog knit 2 stitches together sl slip st purlwise with yarn in back knit knit repeat sts between brackets the indicated number of times k tbl knit through the back loop 1/2 lc slip next stitch to cable needle and purl purl place at front of work k2 then k1 from cable ssk sl1 knitwise sl1 knitwise place both sl sts needle back onto the lefthand needle and ktog tbl 1/2 rc slip next 2 stitches to cable needle pm place marker and place at back of work k1 then k2 from cable needle bor beginning of round sm slip marker __________________________________________________________________________________ cable chart small cable chart medium 4 wonderment socks by debbie ford cable chart large written instructions small row 1 p4 1/2 lc p1 1/2 rc p1 × 2 1/2 lc p1 1/2 rc p3 30 sts row 2 k7 p1 k7 × 2 p1 k6 row 3 p4 k3 p1 k7 × 2 p1 k3 p3 row 4 - 5 repeat row 2 - 3 row 6 repeat row 2 row 7 p4 1/2 rc p1 1/2 lc p1 × 2 1/2 rc p1 1/2 lc p3 row 8 k11 p1 k7 p1 k10 row 9 p4 k7 p1 × 2 k7 p3 row 10 - 11 repeat row 8 - 9 row 12 repeat row 8 written instructions medium row 1 p6 1/2 lc p1 1/2 rc p1 × 2 1/2 lc p1 1/2 rc p5 34 sts row 2 k9 p1 k7 × 2 p1 k8 row 3 p6 k3 p1 k7 × 2 p1 k3 p5 row 4 - 5 repeat row 2 - 3 row 6 repeat row 2 row 7 p6 1/2 rc p1 1/2 lc p1 × 2 1/2 rc p1 1/2 lc p5 row 8 k13 p1 k7 p1 k12 row 9 p6 k7 p1 × 2 k7 p5 row 10 - 11 repeat row 8 - 9 row 12 repeat row 8 5 wonderment socks by debbie ford written instruction large row 1 p4 1/2 lc p1 1/2 rc p1 × 3 1/2 lc p1 1/2 rc p3 38 sts row 2 k7 p1 k7 × 3 p1 k6 row3 p4 k3
